title: Is there an "Off Topic" section?
body:
I remember there being one, it seems like it's not here anymore, at least not in the 'Boards' menu to the left..

Reason is, is that I've been working on a small track (music) and I would like to share it with you guys :P
The private link is here if you want to hear it now, but overall this is still me asking whether there's an "off-topic" section.
(I really do remember there being one...is it a part of Misc or GD now or something??)

Link: https://soundcloud.com/airazeofficial/adronitis/s-5wRHM

replies.body: offtopic was on forums. just use misc like there is nothing here but complaining so its not like it really will make it worse
